788 
WWUS76 KSTO 301933
NPWSTO

URGENT - WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE SACRAMENTO CA
1133 AM PST TUE DEC 30 2014

CAZ067-311200-
/O.UPG.KSTO.WI.Y.0015.000000T0000Z-141231T2000Z/
/O.NEW.KSTO.HW.W.0003.141230T1933Z-141231T2000Z/
/O.CON.KSTO.FZ.A.0001.150101T0800Z-150102T2000Z/
MOTHERLODE-
INCLUDING THE CITIES OF...GRASS VALLEY...JACKSON
1133 AM PST TUE DEC 30 2014

...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST WEDNESDAY...
...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT
THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN SACRAMENTO HAS ISSUED A HIGH WIND
WARNING...WHICH IS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST WEDNESDAY. THE WIND
ADVISORY IS NO LONGER IN EFFECT.

* IMPACTS: DOWNED TREES AND POWERLINES...POSSIBLY WIDESPREAD. 

* WINDS: NORTHEAST 20 TO 40 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 60 MPH. LOCAL
  GUSTS OVER 80 MPH POSSIBLE AT THE HIGHER ELEVATIONS.

* TIMING: TODAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY AM.

* LOCATIONS INCLUDE: DOWNIEVILLE...BLUE CANYON...PACIFIC
  HOUSE...SODA SPRINGS.

FREEZE WATCH INFORMATION

* TEMPERATURES: LOWS IN THE MID TO UPPER 20S. POTENTIAL 
  DURATIONS BELOW FREEZING OF UP TO 8 HOURS. 

* IMPACTS: DAMAGE POSSIBLE TO FREEZE SENSITIVE VEGETATION.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A HIGH WIND WARNING MEANS A HAZARDOUS HIGH WIND EVENT IS EXPECTED
OR OCCURRING. SUSTAINED WIND SPEEDS OF AT LEAST 40 MPH OR GUSTS
OF 58 MPH OR MORE CAN LEAD TO PROPERTY DAMAGE.

A FREEZE WATCH MEANS SUB-FREEZING TEMPERATURES ARE POSSIBLE.
THESE CONDITIONS COULD KILL CROPS AND OTHER SENSITIVE VEGETATION.

&&

INTERACT WITH US VIA SOCIAL MEDIA
WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/NWS.SACRAMENTO
WWW.TWITTER.COM/NWSSACRAMENTO

$$

CAZ069-311200-
/O.UPG.KSTO.WI.Y.0015.000000T0000Z-150101T0100Z/
/O.NEW.KSTO.HW.W.0003.141230T1933Z-141231T2000Z/
WEST SLOPE NORTHERN SIERRA NEVADA-
INCLUDING THE CITY OF...BLUE CANYON
1133 AM PST TUE DEC 30 2014

...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST WEDNESDAY...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN SACRAMENTO HAS ISSUED A HIGH WIND
WARNING...WHICH IS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST WEDNESDAY. THE WIND
ADVISORY IS NO LONGER IN EFFECT.

* IMPACTS: DOWNED TREES AND POWERLINES...POSSIBLY WIDESPREAD. 

* WINDS: NORTHEAST 20 TO 40 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 65 MPH. LOCAL
  GUSTS OVER 80 MPH POSSIBLE AT THE HIGHER ELEVATIONS.

* TIMING: TODAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY AM.

* LOCATIONS INCLUDE: CHESTER...QUINCY...BLUE CANYON.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A HIGH WIND WARNING MEANS A HAZARDOUS HIGH WIND EVENT IS EXPECTED
OR OCCURRING. SUSTAINED WIND SPEEDS OF AT LEAST 40 MPH OR GUSTS
OF 58 MPH OR MORE CAN LEAD TO PROPERTY DAMAGE.

&&

INTERACT WITH US VIA SOCIAL MEDIA
WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/NWS.SACRAMENTO
WWW.TWITTER.COM/NWSSACRAMENTO

CAZ068-311200-
/O.EXT.KSTO.WI.Y.0015.000000T0000Z-141231T2000Z/
WESTERN PLUMAS COUNTY/LASSEN PARK-
INCLUDING THE CITIES OF...CHESTER...QUINCY
1133 AM PST TUE DEC 30 2014

...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST WEDNESDAY...

* WINDS: NORTHEAST 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 55 MPH. LOCAL 
  GUSTS OVER 80 MPH POSSIBLE AT THE HIGHER ELEVATIONS. 

* TIMING: THROUGH WEDNESDAY MID DAY.

* LOCATIONS INCLUDE: CHESTER...QUINCY...BLUE CANYON.

* IMPACTS: DIFFICULT DRIVING CONDITIONS...POSSIBLE TREE DAMAGE AND
  POWER OUTAGES.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A WIND ADVISORY MEANS THAT WINDS OF 40 MPH OR STRONGER ARE
EXPECTED. WINDS THIS STRONG CAN MAKE DRIVING DIFFICULT...
ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH PROFILE VEHICLES. USE EXTRA CAUTION.

&&

INTERACT WITH US VIA SOCIAL MEDIA
WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/NWS.SACRAMENTO
WWW.TWITTER.COM/NWSSACRAMENTO

$$

CAZ015>019-064-066-311200-
/O.CON.KSTO.WI.Y.0015.000000T0000Z-141231T2000Z/
/O.CON.KSTO.FZ.A.0001.150101T0800Z-150102T2000Z/
NORTHERN SACRAMENTO VALLEY-CENTRAL SACRAMENTO VALLEY-
SOUTHERN SACRAMENTO VALLEY-CARQUINEZ STRAIT AND DELTA-
NORTHERN SAN JOAQUIN VALLEY-CLEAR LAKE/SOUTHERN LAKE COUNTY-
NORTHEAST FOOTHILLS/SACRAMENTO VALLEY-
INCLUDING THE CITIES OF...REDDING...CHICO...SACRAMENTO...
STOCKTON...MODESTO...LAKEPORT...PARADISE
1133 AM PST TUE DEC 30 2014

...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST WEDNESDAY...
...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT
THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING...

* WINDS: NORTH 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS 45 TO 55 MPH.

* TIMING: STRONGEST WINDS ARE EXPECTED INTO THIS EVENING.

* LOCATIONS INCLUDE: STOCKTON...MODESTO...SACRAMENTO...CHICO... 
  REDDING...LAKEPORT. 

* IMPACTS: DIFFICULT DRIVING CONDITIONS...POSSIBLE TREE DAMAGE 
  AND POWER OUTAGES. 

FREEZE WATCH INFORMATION

* TEMPERATURES: LOWS IN THE MID TO UPPER 20S. POTENTIAL 
  DURATIONS BELOW FREEZING OF UP TO 8 HOURS. 

* IMPACTS: DAMAGE POSSIBLE TO FREEZE SENSITIVE VEGETATION.

* FOR A DETAILED VIEW OF THE HAZARD AREA...VISIT 
  HTTP://WWW.WEATHER.GOV/SACRAMENTO/HAZARDS 

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A WIND ADVISORY MEANS THAT WINDS OF 25 MPH OR GREATER ARE
EXPECTED OR GUSTS TO 40 MPH OR GREATER. WINDS THIS STRONG CAN
MAKE DRIVING DIFFICULT...ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH PROFILE VEHICLES.
USE EXTRA CAUTION.

A FREEZE WATCH MEANS SUB-FREEZING TEMPERATURES ARE POSSIBLE.
THESE CONDITIONS COULD KILL CROPS AND OTHER SENSITIVE VEGETATION.

&&

INTERACT WITH US VIA SOCIAL MEDIA
WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/NWS.SACRAMENTO
WWW.TWITTER.COM/NWSSACRAMENTO

CAZ013-063-311200-
/O.CON.KSTO.WI.Y.0015.000000T0000Z-141231T2000Z/
SHASTA LAKE AREA / NORTHERN SHASTA COUNTY-
MOUNTAINS SOUTHWESTERN SHASTA COUNTY TO NORTHERN LAKE COUNTY-
INCLUDING THE CITY OF...ALDER SPRINGS
1133 AM PST TUE DEC 30 2014

...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST WEDNESDAY...

* WINDS: NORTHEAST 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH.

* TIMING: STRONGEST WINDS EXPECTED INTO THIS EVENING.

* LOCATIONS INCLUDE: ALDER SPRINGS.

* IMPACTS: DIFFICULT DRIVING CONDITIONS...POSSIBLE TREE DAMAGE 
  AND POWER OUTAGES. 

* FOR A DETAILED VIEW OF THE HAZARD AREA...VISIT 
  HTTP://WWW.WEATHER.GOV/SACRAMENTO/HAZARDS 

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A WIND ADVISORY MEANS THAT WINDS OF 30 MPH OR GREATER ARE
EXPECTED. WINDS THIS STRONG CAN MAKE DRIVING DIFFICULT...
ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH PROFILE VEHICLES. USE EXTRA CAUTION.

&&

INTERACT WITH US VIA SOCIAL MEDIA
WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/NWS.SACRAMENTO
